onboarding.technical_checks_failed: Technical onboarding checks failed. Resolve the issues above.
onboarding.discovery_failed_hint: Please confirm your repo access and make sure the GitHub token is available, then re-run onboarding.
onboarding.discovery_starting: Starting PKM sync and profile discovery. This can take a minute...
onboarding.next_suggest: Next: run {suggest_command} to give the agents a task.
onboarding.onboarding_needs_name: Onboarding needs your name to get started.
onboarding.onboarding_needs_repo: Onboarding needs your Obsidian vault repo URL to continue.
onboarding.onboarding_prompt_repo: Paste the private GitHub repo URL for your Obsidian vault
onboarding.onboarding_prompt_profile_links: Any profile links to reference? (optional, comma-separated):
onboarding.onboarding_missing_value: Please enter a value to continue.
onboarding.db_write_failed: Failed to write {context} data to the database ({location}).
onboarding.db_write_hint_default: Check disk space and file permissions.
onboarding.db_write_hint_disk_io: SQLite reported a disk I/O error. Check disk space and permissions.
onboarding.llm_key_hint: CyberneticAgents stores LLM provider keys in 1Password. Create a vault named '{vault_name}' and add an item named {key_name}.
onboarding.missing_onepassword_auth_hint: Export OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN (or set it in .env) or OP_SESSION_* and re-run onboarding.
onboarding.op_install_hint: Install the 1Password CLI (`op`) and re-run onboarding.
onboarding.op_service_account_hint: Set OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN for a 1Password service account, then re-run onboarding.
onboarding.tool_secret_hint: CyberneticAgents stores tool secrets in 1Password. Create a vault named '{vault_name}' and add an item named {env_name}.
onboarding.network_access_required: Network access is required for web research tools ({skills_list}).
onboarding.enable_network_rerun: Enable outbound network access and re-run onboarding.
onboarding.github_token_missing: Missing {token_env} in 1Password vault '{vault_name}'. PKM sync will be skipped unless it is added.
onboarding.github_token_missing_with_error: Unable to fetch {token_env} from 1Password: {error}. PKM sync will be skipped unless it is available.
onboarding.telegram_not_configured: Telegram is not configured. You can add TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN now to enable the Telegram channel.
onboarding.webhook_mode_optional: Webhook mode is optional. It requires TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK_URL and a secret to validate incoming requests.
onboarding.webhook_secret_prompt: Would you like to store a Telegram webhook secret now?
onboarding.op_install_store: Install the 1Password CLI (`op`) to store secrets automatically.
onboarding.onepassword_write_access_missing: Your 1Password session does not have write access to the '{vault_name}' vault.
onboarding.onepassword_write_access_hint: Ask for write access or use a service account token with write permissions, then re-run onboarding.
onboarding.paste_secret_prompt: Would you like to paste your {description} now and store it in 1Password?
onboarding.required_env_hint: Create a vault named '{vault_name}' and add an item named {env_name}.

onboarding_discovery.need_github_token: We need a GitHub read-only token to sync your private vault.
onboarding_discovery.store_github_token: Store it in the 1Password vault '{vault_name}' as an item named '{token_env}' with a field called 'credential'.
onboarding_discovery.cli_tool_unavailable: CLI tool executor unavailable; cannot sync onboarding repo.
onboarding_discovery.pkm_sync_skipped: PKM sync skipped. The onboarding interview will take longer without it.
onboarding_discovery.pkm_access_unavailable: We couldn't access your PKM vault yet.
onboarding_discovery.pkm_sync_failed: We couldn't sync your PKM vault.
onboarding_discovery.pkm_sync_starting: Syncing your PKM vault (starting CLI tools if needed). This can take up to 10 minutes if Docker needs to pull images...
onboarding_discovery.pkm_sync_still_running: Still syncing your PKM vault... this can take several minutes on the first run.
onboarding_discovery.onepassword_cli_not_ready: 1Password CLI authentication failed: {reason}. Run `op signin` or ensure OP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN is set.
onboarding_discovery.onboarding_interview_longer: The onboarding interview will take longer without your PKM.

onboarding_docker.fix_socket_permissions: Fix Docker socket permissions and re-run onboarding.
onboarding_docker.docker_not_found_no_skills: Docker not found, but no Docker-based skills are configured. Continuing without tool execution.
onboarding_docker.docker_required_missing: Docker is required for tool execution but was not found in PATH.
onboarding_docker.docker_unreachable: Docker is installed but not reachable. Is the daemon running?
onboarding_docker.docker_permission_denied: Docker is running but the current user cannot access the daemon.
onboarding_docker.docker_permission_fix: Fix: add your user to the docker group or run the CLI as the user that owns the Docker Desktop socket.
onboarding_docker.docker_unreachable_no_skills: Docker is installed but not reachable. Continuing without tool execution because no Docker-based skills are configured.
onboarding_docker.cli_tools_image_unverified: Unable to verify the CLI tools image. Is Docker running?
onboarding_docker.docker_daemon_permission_denied: Unable to access the Docker daemon (permission denied).
onboarding_docker.cli_tools_image_missing: CLI tools image is not available. Build or pull the image, then re-run onboarding.

onboarding_memory.unable_store_summary: Warning: unable to store onboarding summary in global memory.

cyberagent.next_suggest: Next: run {suggest_command} to give the agents a task.
cyberagent.no_teams_found: No teams found. Run '{onboarding_command}' to create your first team.
cyberagent.format_tip_yaml: - YAML payload: cyberagent suggest --file payload.yaml --format yaml
cyberagent.next_inbox_or_watch: Next: run {inbox_command} or {watch_command} to check for incoming messages.
cyberagent.telegram_delivery_disabled: Telegram delivery disabled: set TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN to enable replies.
cyberagent.next_start_runtime: Next: run {start_command} to boot the runtime.
cyberagent.next_start_or_status: Next: run {start_command} or check status with {status_command}.
cyberagent.invalid_log_level: Invalid log level. Use: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL.
cyberagent.next_start_runtime_config: Next: run {start_command} to initialize the runtime.
cyberagent.reset_prompt: This will delete all data under ./data and ./logs. Continue? [y/N]
cyberagent.reset_complete: Reset complete. Run 'cyberagent onboarding' to start again.
cyberagent.new_runtime_logs: New runtime logs since last command: {errors} errors, {warnings} warnings. Run 'cyberagent logs' to view.
cyberagent.suggestion_send_timed_out: Suggestion send timed out; the runtime may still be working. Check logs with 'cyberagent logs'.
cyberagent.model_output_parse_failed: Model output could not be parsed. Try rephrasing the request or using a more explicit payload.
cyberagent.runtime_shutdown_timed_out: Runtime shutdown timed out; exiting anyway.

cyberagent_helpers.token_stored_keyring: Token stored securely in the OS keyring.
cyberagent_helpers.keyring_unavailable: Keyring unavailable; token saved to {path} (read/write permissions only).

dev.message_send_timed_out: Message send timed out; the runtime may still be working. Check logs with 'cyberagent logs'.
dev.args_not_object: --args must decode to a JSON object.
dev.cli_tool_unavailable: CLI tool executor unavailable; check CLI tools image.
dev.tool_test_no_agent: Note: running without agent id; permissions not enforced.
dev.failed_start_executor: Failed to start CLI tool executor: {error}

transcribe.low_confidence: Warning: audio quality appears low; transcript may be inaccurate.

headless.no_teams_found: No teams found. Run 'cyberagent onboarding' to create your first team.

status.next_start: Next: run {start_command} to boot the runtime.
status.next_give_task: Next: run {suggest_command} to give the agents a task.
status.next_suggest: Next: run {suggest_command} to define a strategy.
